definition: teaching and learning/to study and impart
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: This paper aims to provide references for boxing skills and cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 旨在爲拳擊的技能傳習轉化爲文化傳承提供參考。

definition: Chinese national culture/studies of ancient Chinese civilization/the Imperial College (history)
(of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another, abbr. for 薪盡火傳|薪尽火传[xin1 jin4 huo3 chuan2]
junior scholar or pupil in imperial China
study of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
